ch.psi.bitshuffle

Class BitShuffleLZ4JNICompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.psi.bitshuffle.BitShuffleLZ4JNICompressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BitShuffleLZ4Compressor

    public class BitShuffleLZ4JNICompressor
extends Object
implements BitShuffleLZ4Compressor
    BitShuffleLZ4Compressor implemented with JNI bindings to the original C implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        public int compress(ByteBuffer src,
                    int srcOff,
                    ByteBuffer dest,
                    int destOff,
                    int nElements,
                    int bytesPerElement,
                    int blockSize)
        Description copied from interface: BitShuffleLZ4Compressor
        Compress src into dest and return the compressed length. ByteBuffer positions remain unchanged.
        Specified by:
        compress in interface BitShuffleLZ4Compressor
        Parameters:
        src - The src ByteBuffer
        srcOff - The src offset (where compression should start)
        dest - The dest ByteBuffer
        destOff - The dest offset (where the compressed bytes should be stored)
        nElements - The number of elements in src
        bytesPerElement - The bytes used to represent one element
        blockSize - The block size to use (recommended to use 0 for auto selection)
        Returns:
        int The compressed bytes

      • maxCompressedLength

        public int maxCompressedLength(int size,
                               int elemSize,
                               int blockSize)
        Description copied from interface: BitShuffleLZ4Compressor
        The max possible size after compression.
        Specified by:
        maxCompressedLength in interface BitShuffleLZ4Compressor
        Parameters:
        size - The number of elements in src
        elemSize - The bytes used to represent one element
        blockSize - The block size to use (recommended to use 0 for auto selection)
        Returns:
        int The max size
